name: Gourmet Pixel
tagline: In-house mobile software and app development
description:
We are an independent UK based app development studio, providing a complete in-house mobile software and app development service, from concept, prototyping, wire-framing, design & development to QA / testing and distribution. 
Our clients include EA, AVON, Virgin and Wolfgang Puck. They vary from large global brands, to agencies and start-ups. 

Gourmet Pixel apps have been promoted by Apple on numerous occasions and downloaded millions of times. They have also featured in publications such as the Telegraph, Macworld. Our Christmas app was featured as app of the month in the December in-store magazine at O2 shops.
